# Read input
A, B, X = map(int, input().split())

# Check if it is possible
if A <= X <= A + B:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

import sys

# get the input and assign them to variables
A, B, X = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

# if X is less than A, it is impossible
if X < A:
    print("NO")

# if X is greater than A and B, it is impossible
elif X > A + B:
    print("NO")

# if X is greater than or equal to A and less than or equal to A + B, it is possible
elif X >= A and X <= A + B:
    print("YES")
